passwordPolicy: length(8) and maxLength(24) and lowerCase(1) and upperCase(1) and digits(1) and regexPattern(^(?=.*[@$!%*?&#-]).+$) and passwordHistory(3)

clients.name: Denver Orchestration
clients.description: Client used by cairo for communicating with denver

clients.name: Orchestration service
clients.description: Client used by cairo for orchestration with VuBlockStore

policies.name: denver-orchestration
policies.description: Client based policy to allow the client `denver-orchestration` access to certain resources defined in the `vusmartmaps` client

policies.name: evaluate-user-privilege
policies.description: Evaluate a user or client's `privilege` attribute to grant or deny it access to a resource

policies.name: denver-orchestration-permission
policies.description: Permission to allow the client `denver-orchestration` to access the `Data Model` and `Data Store` resources of the client `vusmartmaps`

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

clientScopes.name: vusmartmaps
clientScopes.description: Application specific protocol mappers for VuSmartMaps

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token
